ranklist.title: Commercial Slushy Machine 24L Double Tank Frozen Drink Machine 1050W Stainless Steel Margarita Wine Slush Smoothies Maker for Restaurant Bar Party
contents: Large Capacity & Leak-proof Seal: Frozen slush machine can hold a large amount of slushies or frozen drinks. The size of the tank is 35*30cm (13.78”*11.81”inch). Two barrels can hold 24L ( 6.4 Gal). It makes a variety of alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks. With seal ring, the liquid won’t leak from the cylinder and the drain tube.

Premium Slushy Machine: The material of the Frozen Drink Maker is 304 stainless steel. It provides excellent resistance to corrosion and rust. That durability makes 304 easy to sanitize, and therefore ideal for kitchen and food applications. PC Tank, cylinder and outer spiral have better transmittance, easy installation and strong resistance.

Two Modes for Margarita Maker: Two tanks have independent settings, so they can work without interfering. Cool or freeze modes are also controlled separately for situations when you enjoy the alcohol drinks on one side and frozen lemonade on the other. A, B, C switches will be used to adjust the temperature, including 37.4℉, 41 ℉, 48.2℉, 51.8℉ of the juice.

Powerful Compressor & Clean Spiral: Frozen Drink Machine can quickly cool down, save electricity and make low noise with all copper coil compressors. It also ensure stable operation and has long service life. Silver cylinder and black outer spiral are resistant to dirt and easy to clean by using cloth.

Wide Application: A number of different kinds of drinks can be made by this machine, such as Margarita cocktails, wine slushies, frozen coffee and alcoholic beverages, Fruit Drinks and Smoothies. It is suitable for restaurant, bar, weekend party, tea shop winery and nail salon. Perfect for home and commercial use.

ranklist.title: TECSPACE 110V 1 Tank 15L Commercial Slushy Machine 600W, Stainless Steel Margarita Smoothie Frozen Drink Maker for Cocktail Ice Juice Tea Coffee Making, Sliver
contents: 【PREMIUM 304 STAINLESS STEEL】-The whole smoothie machine is made of superior food grade 304 stainless steel,high pressure resistance and easy to clean.Including 15L x 1 bowl (600W),Power supply:110V/60Hz,slush comes during 30min- 45min,intelligence temperature control:the temperature will automatically controlled at -2℃~-8℃.

【FOOD GRADE PC MATERIAL】- The tank of slushy machine adopts durable food grade transparent PC material（polycarbonate）so it possesses features of anti-corrosion,high/low temperature resistance,toughness,no toxicity,excellent flexibility.The stainless steel smoothie machine surface have a stylish and modern appearance,a good effect of anti-corrosion,a standard safe level, long service life,making our all customers safer and more assured.

【QUICK REFRIGERATION & BLEND】 - Double-sided refrigeration system has excellent functions of rapid refrigeration and high-efficient slush production,which is specially designed for manufacturing summer frozen drink business. The powerful and long-lasting compressor with copper wires helps refrigerate and form swiftly,more power-efficient,lower decibel and noise.Fine and even smoothie mixed together gives you a tender and smooth taste in summer.

【INTELLIGENT CONFIGURATION】- The slushy machine adopts latest electromagnetic transmission shaft,the parts and magnetic transmission are much better than traditional electromagnetic transmission shaft,increasing mixed resistance and minced friction.Additionally,The frozen drink maker is equipped with intelligence temperature control system so it can works automatically at a constant temperature.In addition,the slushy machine can be set to NIGHT mode,keep material temperature 3~7℃(37.4~44.6 °F).

【RELIABLE CUSTOMER SERVICE】 - The operation of the frozen drink machine is simply completed by touch buttons.It is the perfect choice for frozen cocktail,margarita,daiquiri,juice,milkshake,smoothie,iced coffee,iced cappuccino,which can bring more business for your drink shops,bars,restaurants,cafeterias,dessert shops.Quality commitment:our product is provided with 18 months warranty.Please feel free to contact our customer service if you have any questions about our product.

ranklist.title: VEVOR 110V Slushy Machine 24L Double Bowl Frozen Drink 700W Stainless Steel Margarita Maker for Supermarkets Restaurants Commercial Use, Sliver
contents: 24l Slushy Machine: Double-bowl slushy machine, 24L (3.2 US gal)*2 in capacity,high-capacity produces up to 50 cups of beverage . 700W rated wattage and professional Embraco compressor lead to stable and powerful operation.

Food Grade Material: Tenacious PC container is shock-proof. PC+anti-corrosion stirrer with dual-screw design for 360°mixing. Safer and healthier environment is guarded along with night preservation function which keeps drinks fresh.

Trouble-free Control Panel: Brief control panel is equipped on machine side. Simple buttons conveniently modify machine operation. With clear digital temperature display and tank illumination, carefree operation can be obtained.

Compelling Performance: Compact reduction gear motor and all-cooper-tube refrigeration adopted. Axial flow fan will not stuck. Large air duct area for quicker ventilation. Magnetically transmit snow block and maintains perfect supplying skills.

Wide Application: Suitable for icy drinks including fruit juice, tea,frozen cocktails, iced coffee, frappes, etc. Perfect for indoor residential as well as commercial business use. Stays cool in any situation.Note:Sugar is essential when you use the drink machine and do not just use water during the procedure. The sugar content should not be less than 13% with sucrose and less than 22% with maltose. Meanwhile, after receiving the machine, you'd better use it 24 hours later.

ranklist.title: VBENLEM 1600W Commercial Slushy Machine 24L Double Tank slushie machine Stainless Steel Margarita Smoothie Frozen Drink Maker Efficient Cooling Perfect for Supermarkets Cafes Restaurants Bars
contents: 24L SLUSHIE MACHINE - Sushy Machine with 24L/6.34Gal, this frozen slush machine can hold a great number of slushies. Featuring a 1600-watt powerful compressor for rapid cooling.Superior quality stainless steel evaporators ensure fast refrigeration.

High Efficiency - The broadened mixing stirrers reduce sediment and stir drinks 360-degree.Rust-less and durable for long-time use, allowing an easier cleaning and less complicated maintenance.Double-sided refrigeration system lead to the fast refrigeration and high efficiency of producing slush.

Trouble-Free Usage - Slushy machine use electromagnetic transmission shaft, magnetic transmission, parts.Detachable trip trays to place cups & glasses and maintain your place neat and clean. Light boards allow for a more charming appearance. Faucets with large diameter for rapid dispensing. Large air vents facilitate long-period operation. Rubber foot pads provide buffer function and protection.

Advanced Quality -All the tank are made of PC material which is high/low temperature resistance, good flexibility and removable.Thickened SUS body is of top-grade rigidity. Rust-less and durable for long-time use, allowing an easier cleaning and less complicated maintenance.

Widely Application - Commercial slushie machine suit for icy drinks including fruit juice, tea,frozen cocktails, iced coffee, etc. Perfect for indoor residential as well as commercial business use,will bring more business to your bar, restaurant, etc.

ranklist.title: VEVOR Slush Frozen Drink Machine, 2x15L Tank Commercial Margarita Machine, 1000W Stainless Steel Margarita Slush Maker, Temperature Slush 25°F to 30°F Drink Maker, Perfect for Restaurants Cafes Bars
contents: 3L/ 8GAL Slushie Machine: With double tanks 15 L x 2/ 4 US gallon x 2 capacity, this frozen slush machine can hold a great number of slushies and drinks, and it can be used for different flavors. An interior bowl light illuminates your beverages, thus showcasing their vibrant colors and helping them sell themselves.

Advanced Quality: Superior stainless steel body, food-grade PC tanks, and two-layers ABS lids ensure durability for long-time use and allows easier cleaning and less complicated maintenance. The broadened mixing stirrers, with 360-degree, rotate, reduce sediment and stir drinks.

Precise Control Area: Brief control panel is equipped on the machine. Each bowl operates independently of the other and can be switched on/off or between cool drink and slush modes. Designed with the preservation function, you can set the temperature from 25 °F to 30 °F to keep the slushies fresh. You can use the panel according to your needs.

Powerful Compressor: This frozen drink maker featuring a 1000-watt powerful compressor for rapid cooling, energy-saving, and low noise. It allows you to prepare slushies in 45-80 minutes. With the antifreeze cylinder system, the machine can automatically start and cease to solve the freezing problem of the cylinder, thus extending the machine's service life. A superior quality condenser ensures fast refrigeration and stable operation.

Considerate Designs: Detachable trip trays to place cups & glasses and maintain your place neat and clean. Faucets with large diameter for rapid dispensing. Large air vents facilitate long-period operation. Rubber foot pads provide buffer function and durability.

ranklist.title: VEVOR Commercial Slushy Machine, 3x15L Tank Commercial Margarita Maker, 1200W Stainless Steel Frozen Drink Machine, Temperature Adjustment 16°F to 32°F, Perfect for Restaurants Cafes Bars
contents: 45L/ 12Gal Slushy Machine: With triple tanks 15 L x 3 / 4 US gallon x 3 capacity, this frozen slush machine can hold a great number of slushies and drinks, and it can be used for different flavors. An interior bowl light illuminates your beverages, thus showcasing their vibrant colors and helping them sell themselves.

Advanced Quality: Superior stainless steel body, food-grade PC tanks, and two-layers ABS lids ensure durability for long-time use and allows easier cleaning and less complicated maintenance. The broadened mixing stirrers, with 360-degree rotation, reduce sediment and stir drinks.

Precise Control Area: Brief control panel is equipped on the machine. Each bowl operates independently and can be switched on/off or between cool drink and slush modes. Designed with the preservation function, you can set the temperature from 16 °F to 32 °F (-9-0 ℃) to keep the slushies fresh. You can use the panel according to your needs.

Powerful Compressor: This frozen drink maker featuring an 800-watt powerful compressor for rapid cooling, energy-saving, and low noise. It allows you to prepare slushies in 50 minutes. With the antifreeze cylinder system, the machine can automatically start and cease to solve the freezing problem of the cylinder, thus extending the machine's service life. A superior quality condenser ensures fast refrigeration and stable operation.

Considerate Designs: Detachable trip trays to place cups & glasses and maintain your place neat and clean. Faucets with large diameter for rapid dispensing. Large air vents facilitate long-period operation. Rubber foot pads provide buffer function and durability.
